title: Horriffic lag
body:
Seems quite a few people are getting lag recently.

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/r16Xk9K0-lag-since-patch

I am also regularly crashing out at end of game and getting the following message. (yes I have done a disk cleanup so temp folder should be empty)


is this happening for others?

replies.body:
Hi Essemble,

What kind of symptoms are you getting for lag - high ping? high packet loss?  What ISP and location are you playing from?

Regarding the error message - perhaps you could try running the game as administrator? 

Cheers
Mindstar
Playing on tpg (i know i know). Hasn't been a problem for a long time but regular ping spikes and disconnects in the last 3 or 4 weeks. Sydney location.
glad im not the only one literally happened overnight for me and hasn't changed. played other online games and they're fine
